mapper.insert: insert into tbl_review(reviewNo, bno, review, reviewer) values(seq_review.nextval, #{bno}, #{review}, #{reviewer})
mapper.update: update tbl_review set review = #{review}, updateDate = sysdate where reviewNo = #{reviewNo}
mapper.select: select bno, reviewNo, review, reviewer, reviewDate, updatedate from (select /*+INDEX(tbl_review idx_review) */ rownum rn, bno, reviewNo, review, reviewer, reviewDate, updatedate from tbl_review where bno = #{bno} and reviewNo > 0 and rownum <=#{cri.pageNum} * #{cri.amount}) where rn > (#{cri.pageNum} - 1) * #{cri.amount}
select count(*) from tbl_review where bno = #{bno}
